sentences.en: 30 percent of reptiles, birds, and fish are currently threatened with extinction.
sentences.cn: 目前，30%的爬行动物、鸟类和鱼类面临灭绝的危险。

sentences.en: As a group, today's old people are still relatively deprived.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，当今的老年人依然相对贫困。

sentences.en: Butter, margarine, and oily fish are all good sources of vitamin D.
sentences.cn: 黄油、人造黄油和多脂鱼都含有丰富的维生素D。

sentences.en: Doctors are complaining about being barraged by drug-company salesmen.
sentences.cn: 医生们抱怨他们疲于应付医药公司的销售人员。

sentences.en: Fresh fruits and vegetables are important and so is bran.
sentences.cn: 新鲜的水果和蔬菜很重要，麦麸也是。

sentences.en: Husband and wife are now taxed separately on their incomes.
sentences.cn: 现在夫妻双方分别按各自的收入纳税。

sentences.en: Remember, happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely upon what you think.--Dale Carnegie
sentences.cn: 请记住，幸福不在于你是谁或者你拥有什么，而仅仅取决于你的心态！

sentences.en: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
sentences.cn: 你是什么样的人和你想成为什么样的之间的差距就是，你做了什么。

sentences.en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
sentences.cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

sentences.en: The papers in maths and English are very testing.
sentences.cn: 数学试卷和英语试卷很难。

sentences.en: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.
sentences.cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

sentences.en: There are intangible benefits beyond a rise in the share price.
sentences.cn: 除股价上升之外还有无形利益。

sentences.en: We are sure you dare not.
sentences.cn: 我们断定你们是不敢的。

sentences.en: We are taught to construe these terms in a particular way.
sentences.cn: 我们被教导要以特定的方式理解这些词语。

sentences.en: You are welcome to visit the hospital at any time.
You can chat to other people who are online.
sentences.cn: 你可以和其他在线的人聊天。

words.tran_cn: 是（be的第二人称单复数现在式）

phrases.tran_cn: 其实；实际上；事实上；照现在的样子
我们是一体；我们在一起
《我们准备好了》（北京奥运会一周年倒计时主题歌）
无论你在哪儿；无论你身在何处

trans.tran_en: a unit of area equal to 100 sq metres or 119.599 sq yards; one hundredth of a hectare
the present tense and plural of ‘be’

trans.tran_cn: （用于第二人称单复数现在时，第一、三人称复数现在时）是
